title: SpongeBob SquarePants
short_plot_summary: SpongeBob SquarePants, a square sponge living in a pineapple under the sea, goes on adventures with his best friends Patrick Star and Sandy Cheeks, and works at the Krusty Krab restaurant.
explanation: A sponge, representing the main character, SpongeBob SquarePants
A crab, symbolizing SpongeBob's employer, Mr. Krabs, and the Krusty Krab restaurant where SpongeBob works
A pineapple, representing SpongeBob's iconic pineapple house
An octopus, referring to SpongeBob's grumpy neighbor, Squidward Tentacles
A burger, indicating the Krabby Patty, the famous burger served at the Krusty Krab restaurant
